item.title: Joshua add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Nothing evokes the prurient like puritanism." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Joshua add a quote by Kevin Hearne
Joshua add a quote by Kevin Hearne
item.description: "You will respect my authori-tah!' Oberon said, in a passable imitation of Eric Cartman. I reminded him that I needed to concentrate. Sometimes dogs forget; they just get too excited." -- Kevin Hearne

item.title: Joshua add a quote by Kevin Hearne
item.description: "You killed my father,” he snorted in a basso profundo rumble. “Prepare to die!” “Inigo Montoya? Is that you?" -- Kevin Hearne
